trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event when a Sort button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>hendelse når en sorteringsknappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen behandler sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Sort button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Sort".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression.
trans-unit.target: (Sorter-knappen er en knapp der `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Sorter".) Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel tilpasse Sorteringsuttrykket.

trans-unit.source: A ListViewSortEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewSortEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden.

trans-unit.source: This object enables you to specify or determine the sort expression and sort direction for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet, kan du angi eller fastslå uttrykk og sortering Sorteringsretning for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the sort expression, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå Sorteringsuttrykket den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the sort direction, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå sorteringsretningen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also cancel a sorting operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også avbryte en sortering ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewSortEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewSortEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>|The value of the `sortExpression` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A>|The value of the `sortDirection` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>| Verdien for den `sortExpression` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A>| Verdien for den `sortDirection` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression that is used to sort the items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket som brukes til å sortere elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> value that indicates the direction in which to sort the items in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdi som angir retningen Sorteringsretning elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen Sorteringsretning den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event is raised, you can use the SortDirection property to specify or determine the order in which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control will sort items.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>denne hendelsen oppstår, kan du bruke egenskapen SortDirection å angi eller fastslå rekkefølgen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen sorteres elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that is used to sort the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir uttrykket som brukes til å sortere elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event is raised, you can use the SortExpression property to specify the sort expression that will be used to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>denne hendelsen oppstår, kan du bruke egenskapen SortExpression til å angi sorteringsuttrykk som skal brukes til å sortere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression contains the name of the field to sort.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsuttrykket inneholder navnet på feltet som skal sorteres.

trans-unit.source: You can also sort multiple columns at a time by programmatically setting this property to a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også sortere flere kolonner samtidig ved å angi denne egenskapen programmatisk til en kommadelt liste med feltnavn.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control applies the sort direction to the complete list of columns.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen bruker sorteringsretningen til en fullstendig liste over kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the sort direction applies to only the last column in the list.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet gjelder sorteringsretningen bare den siste kolonnen i listen.

trans-unit.source: The expression that is used to sort the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykket som brukes til å sortere elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.
